title: Bloomberg Markets: Minerd on Fed's `Slow and Easy' Policy

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Scott Minerd\u0010Global Chief Investment Officer\u0010Guggenheim Partners\u0010Discussing the markets, Fed policy and fixed-income investment strategy.
